replies.body: Will the AI games be fixed? Only 4 Bots active.
I think that might be intentional since the AI for a jungler bot doesn't exist and they don't want you to have to 2v1 if one of your team goes jungle.
That would be fine if we had people actually jungling, the bots seem to afk even if everyone goes into a lane.

I've seen a few people go jungle.

Of course, having a 2v1 in your favor is more fun than having one against you so even if nobody goes jungle, it's not really a problem.
It's a problem if you like playing Bot games. Before, when there was a jungler and 5 active Bots, the jungler could practice ganging top vs 2
But even if we don't go jungler only 4 bots....why would they do this? It must be a bug. I sent in bug reports and they told me they are passing it along.

> [{quoted}](name=Jinxalot,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=bZwgzbRA,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2018-08-15T01:40:04.880+0000)
>
> But even if we don't go jungler only 4 bots....why would they do this? It must be a bug. I sent in bug reports and they told me they are passing it along.

Before this "bug" a lot of people got stuck top 1v2 top because many people jungled.  Now since there's only 1 bot top, everyone wants to go there especially 2 vs 1 and no jungle.  Top in bots is called first almost every time I play it.  There are also times only one person goes bot and two top because you know... it's so easy now with two ranged against what's almost always a melee bot.
It was never a problem. How many Bot games were lost?
Lol who on earth plays bot games

> [{quoted}](name=8131snake,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=bZwgzbRA,comment-id=000e0001,timestamp=2018-08-15T18:10:05.182+0000)
>
> Lol who on earth plays bot games

A lot of people?

I'm amazed there was no description written on the nerfs to the 47% winrate  {{champion:223}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
They originally had a damage buff on W. RIP my main.

Yeah they stealth removed the damage buffs the same day they created an uproar with the Yasuo ultimate buffs. This is messed up. Tahm Kench was already not in the best state so to gut him like this with practically nonexistent compensation is absurd.
The change was more so intended towards pro play, where Tahm is played constantly.
He is only played to counter the crazy assassin burst meta. When that dies, so will his pick rate.

Changing the entire game based on pro play is not okay, this is what i mean when i say rito only cares about worlds and lcs. also they show very clear favoritism towards assassins, what with true damage this, and true damage that, how are we supposed to tank when anyone can negate 20% of our armor flat? and thats BEFORE actual armor pen items, throw in full lethality, black cleaver, and LDR and you have like 80% armor pen.
fuck this assassin burst meta.
Yeah, they have such clear bias that they nerfed all of the burst damage runes while also buffing up several tanks. Did you even read the patch notes?
I noticed this new dude who gives patch notes doesn't really explain any of the changes, and there's little joy in reading about them.
Naut cool.
Because a weaker shield for Nautilus and nerfing Tahmâ€™s W adds durability?

Agreed, failing to see how patch helps Naut sustain...

_Tanks haven't been feeling so hot in recent patches, so we're taking this opportunity to put more durability into their kits._

Oh hey, look at what bug still hasn't been fixed after almost 1.5 years even though it was mentioned last patch.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/wLM7yQjt-patch-815-notes?comment=000c

oh wait it was also mentioned 2 months ago:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/Jz07sgE0-patch-813-notes?comment=000e

Still. Not. Fixed.
I suppose with her rework coming up, they just don't care enough to bug fix it :/
except the bug will still affect her rework since it affects all AoE auto attacks like Nocturn passive
good god bro i see ur post every patch notes how have they not fixed it???? I saw a rioter responded to someone saying "I like the way you divide nerfs and buffs" and not ur comment like what??
cause that would imply they fucked up, and riot doesn't really acknowledge that

> "Tanks haven't been feeling so hot in recent patches, so we're taking this opportunity to put more durability into their kits."

Proceeds to nerf multiple tanks like Nautilus and Tahm Kench. Fun...

>Heal
>Cooldown decreased.
>In patch 8.6, Heal was crowding out other options in mid lane, so we lengthened its cooldown. This pushed both marksmen and mid laners onto teleport (which has had a much more notable impact on the meta), so we're reverting the Heal nerf. 
>COOLDOWN 270 seconds â‡’ 240 seconds 

Well, maybe people will stop using {{summoner:14}} so much.

Nope, they won't.

{{summoner:3}} nerfed {{summoner:7}} nerfed(now buffed) {{summoner:12}} nerfed
{{summoner:14}} buffed 
ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”
Did anyone felt that Patch Notes descriptions are getting lazier & lazier each time an update comes? I mean come on, they didn't bother describing that random-ass Tahm Kench nerfs.

But it was a buff to TK remember.. /s

_Tanks haven't been feeling so hot in recent patches, so we're taking this opportunity to put more durability into their kits._

Then guts his whole kit...
Was that supposed to be a Buff to Tahm Kench? Because I'm pretty sure you just gutted him.....

It was a bunch of nerfs disguised as buffs. Riot has a hard-on for getting rid of this champion from pro play because it is the only thing that counters assassins. In solo queue, the champion is pretty bad. Riot's attempt was to probably push him into top lane more but they didn't compensate him at all and instead just gutted his support capabilities while not addressing his lack of tankiness in the duo lane.

The problem is, all anyone is going to see is that top lane Kench is going to become abusive because he can get into melee range regularly and eat you every few seconds. There will be no practical use for his W 'buff' in bot lane and all tongue lash cd reduction will do is make him go OOM faster. Yet, the pros will still choose him for his ability in organized play to save someone who gets caught out. Basically unless they delete the champion's ability to save allies, he will still get picked in a meta where you can go from 100-0% health in the matter of 0.5 seconds. All this does is make him feel like absolute shit for us players who stuck with the champ.

The champion is dead without any further changes. Mark my words.

I'm still waiting for {{champion:44}}  default adaptive stat to be changed to AD.  It makes no sense to me how Blitzcrank can get AD by default when his AP scalings are way better than Taric's and Taric's passive literally doubles his attack speed.
Why hasn't the bug with Akali being able to use an enemy Akali shroud to stealth been addressed?
Might not be a bug. Dravens can catch each other's axes, Olaf can, uh, pick up other Olaf's axes, etc.
I don't think it's a bug. It's also only a relevant issue outside of ranked play since the only time you can have 2 of the same champ are in normals, aram and RGM.
Unless I am mistaken you cannot have two of the same champ in ARAM, and normal draft also excludes it. That leaves blind pick, a few of the rgms.

I'm sure it's intended.

I played a One For All match where both teams where Akali. I had no idea what the numbers where in teamfights because there was smoke everywhere.
Rip Tahm, you will be missed
Every 2 weeks is just another disappointment :\
Agrees
Still no Ashe buff I see
Sometimes champs don't need buffs when other champs get nerfs.

its been this cycle of nerfing and buffing the same champs for ages, why not just buff some champs who havent seen the light of meta in years? there are plenty.
renekton for example, great lane bully, LITERALLY USELESS if the enemy team groups and your team can't provide enough pressure to keep them from roaming(without being killed)
No love for {{champion:54}} ?

> [{quoted}](name=HommeGoujon,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=bZwgzbRA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-14T18:28:51.438+0000)
>
> No love for {{champion:54}} ?

I enjoy Malph a lot, and he got buffed a few patches ago with his E ratio, what more do you want?

>  COOLDOWN 50-25 seconds (at levels 1-18) â‡’ 25-20 seconds (at levels 1-18) 

Isn't that a huge buff to electrocute if you can proc it twice as often early?
They're mainly trying to limit the one-shot potential of champs with these changes.
